title: Nordstrom shares jump more than 10% on report retailer is trying to go private
description: Nordstrom is reportedly considering going private weeks after it gave a gloomy sales outlook for 2024.
keywords: Nordstrom Inc, Business, Retail industry, Breaking News: Business, Morgan Stanley, business news
snippet:
Shoppers exit the Nordstrom at the Westfield Topanga mall in Canoga Park, California, on Aug. 14, 2023.

Nordstrom shares jumped more than 10% on Tuesday follow...
